modals.descriptionNewParent: A node will be created at the root level.
modals.descriptionNewChild: A child node will be created under ID: {item}.
modals.descriptionDelete: Are you sure you want to delete node ID: {item}? This action cannot be undone.

alerts.createRootSuccess: The root node was created successfully.
alerts.fetchError: Could not retrieve information for node ID: {item}.
alerts.hasChildrenError: Node ID: {item} has registered child nodes and cannot be deleted.
alerts.genericError: An unexpected error occurred while processing the node.
alerts.noChildren: The node ID: {item} is a final node and has no children to display.
alerts.navigationError: An error occurred while trying to access the children.

messages.somethingwentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
